title: 820-3476 a1502 restarting
message:
hello got a1502 can on but suddenly restart itself after entering the password then hangs apple logo with loading bar.
tried change ssd still same try run diagnostics no issues found.
no sign of waterdamage or corrosion.
i run smc bypass no restart.
got this panic error.

title: 820-3476 a1502 restarting
message:
Disconnect internal SSD and test with USB macOS.
If still the same, clean ME region in BIOS.

title: 820-3476 a1502 restarting
message:
still same can u give me clean me 820-3476-a
thanks!

title: 820-3476 a1502 restarting
message: Then may be CPU, or RAM problem.
